# Draft:Edward J. Daly

Edward James Daly (March 29, 1892 â€“ July 20, 1959) was a justice of the Connecticut Supreme Court from 1954 to 1959.
Born in Hartford, Connecticut on March 29, 1892.
He served in the aviation section of the signal corps of the United States Army during World War I.
